items.title: Robot metabolism: The next evolution of our overlords? (Video)
items.summary: Engineers have developed robots with the ability to grow, self-repair, and morph by absorbing parts from other robots, inching us closer to the singularity.

items.title: Reflexive AI: Adapt or Become Obsolete
items.summary: Reflexive AI emphasizes the need for companies to adapt to AI technology in order to avoid becoming obsolete in the rapidly changing landscape. Many companies are now realizing the importance of incorporating AI into their operations to stay competitive in the modern market.

items.title: AI Models With Systemic Risks Given Pointers on How to Comply With EU AI Rules

items.title: OpenAI Won’t Be Profitable Until 2027 & “Test” Investor Expectations, Says JPMorgan
items.summary: Investment banking giant JPMorgan predicts that OpenAI will not be profitable until 2027, highlighting the long road to financial success for the AI leader. The majority of OpenAI's revenue comes from customer subscriptions, indicating a focus on generating consistent income rather than immediate profitability.

items.title: OpenAI announces ChatGPT Agent – its agentic AI that does tasks for you
items.summary: OpenAI announces its latest agentic AI called ChatGPT Agent, combining features from Operator and ChatGPT to interact with websites, provide conversational fluency, research skills, and information synthesis.

items.title: mcp-fmri 1.0.0
